product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegantly styled banner is divided into four quadrants, each shaded in soft, muted pink tones that create a gentle and luxurious feel. The top-left quadrant features a circular backdrop overlaid with three text layers: a bold brand logo (`brand_logo`), a product title with two-line layout (`heading`), and a material descriptor in a modern font (`subheading`). The top-right quadrant showcases a centered product image (`product_image`), with a subtle dotted carousel navigation above it.

In the bottom-left, benefits are listed with bullet points (`description`), followed by a bold product price (`price`) and a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) containing a white label (`cta`). Background elements include softly-rendered circles and delicate diagonal lines and curves that add a decorative yet understated aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Peach (#FFF5F5)
- Blush Pink (#FFE8E6)
- Rose Tint (#F8D1D0)
- Dusty Rose (#EDC2C2)
- Coral Pink (#FFDCD7)
- Warm Rose (#C06A6A)
- Earthy Brown (#8B5A5A)
- Accent Coral (#E9967A)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings with a delicately feminine color palette. The main colors include a soft rose gold (#F4AAB9), prominently featured in the floral metal detailing, and a pastel pink (#F7C6CC) embedded in the teardrop-shaped elements. Sparkling crystal-like gems, colored in shimmering white (#FFFFFF), add pristine highlights. The rose gold structure seamlessly blends with the crystals surrounding it, offering contrast yet harmony. This luxurious combination of warm pinks and icy brilliance gives a balanced and sophisticated feel, ideal for a premium or romantic-themed advertisement banner. Accent colors could include muted peach (#FAD4D8) and metallic blush (#E6A6A9).
